item.title: Introduction to Blockchain Technology
item.description: Blockchain technology is emerging as a disruptive force in financial industry with applications growing beyond cryptocurrencies to smart-contracts, distributed ledgers, online voting, insurance, and supply chain logistics. We’d like to thank Professor Henry Kim for giving a fantastic introductory talk on the matter. Inside will be his slides and photos of the event which he has graciously provided us. Slides and Photos Coming Soon
